svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 25 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 25, 2023" date: "2023-11-24"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko : Devnet-11: mostly stable
Devnet-12 : planned for next week if 3+ CL clients are ready Goerli: upgrade unlikely in December;
client team & EF validators will be stopped 3 months after upgrading (or 1 month after mainnet upgrade
if later), then 1 month of chaos testing eth_multicallV1 proposed addition to JSON RPC
â€¢ Devnet-11: mostly stable
Devnet-11: mostly stable
â€¢ Devnet-12 : planned for next week if 3+ CL clients are ready
Devnet-12 : planned for next week if 3+ CL clients are ready
â€¢ Goerli: upgrade unlikely in December; client team & EF validators will be stopped 3 months after
upgrading (or 1 month after mainnet upgrade if later), then 1 month of chaos testing
Goerli: upgrade unlikely in December; client team & EF validators will be stopped 3 months after
â€¢ eth_multicallV1 proposed addition to JSON RPC
eth_multicallV1 proposed addition to JSON RPC
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.00% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold Lido node operator InfStones server
vulnerabilities disclosed
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.00% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Lido node operator InfStones server vulnerabilities disclosed
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Geographic diversity needed , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Geographic diversity needed , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Dapplion: EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) may not be required for several years
Dapplion: EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) may not be required for several years
â€¢ MEV Order Flow Auctions overview
MEV Order Flow Auctions overview
Client releases
â€¢ Execution layer: Reth v0.1.0-alpha.11 : Cancun-ready, op-reth, adds eth_callBundle, eth_getProof &
trace_filter and more accurate RPC tracing
â€¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.11 : Cancun-ready, op-reth, adds eth_callBundle, eth_getProof & trace_filter and
more accurate RPC tracing
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs EIP7563 : Time Capsule encryption via VDF
EIPs
â€¢ EIP7563 : Time Capsule encryption via VDF
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7564 : Contract wallet management NFT
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7564 : Contract wallet management NFT
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry: forge-std v1.7.3 : adds mock ERC20 & ERC721 contracts and new cheat codes: stop/start state
diff recording & compute create/create2 address Foundry-devops v0.1.0 : get most recent deployment,
removed ffi requirement anvil-web3 : create & interact with Anvil instances from Python
Foundry:
â€¢ forge-std v1.7.3 : adds mock ERC20 & ERC721 contracts and new cheat codes: stop/start state diff
recording & compute create/create2 address
forge-std v1.7.3 : adds mock ERC20 & ERC721 contracts and new cheat codes: stop/start state diff
â€¢ Foundry-devops v0.1.0 : get most recent deployment, removed ffi requirement
Foundry-devops v0.1.0 : get most recent deployment, removed ffi requirement
â€¢ anvil-web3 : create & interact with Anvil instances from Python
anvil-web3 : create & interact with Anvil instances from Python
â€¢ Edge (EVM domain specific language) specification
Edge (EVM domain specific language) specification
â€¢ Impersonator iframe : connect to a dapp in iframe via SafeConnector
Impersonator iframe : connect to a dapp in iframe via SafeConnector
â€¢ Solidity inheritance puzzle solution
Solidity inheritance puzzle solution
â€¢ Scaffold-ETH 2 challenges teaching Solidity, Hardhat, NextJS, Scaffold-ETH 2 & The Graph
Scaffold-ETH 2 challenges teaching Solidity, Hardhat, NextJS, Scaffold-ETH 2 & The Graph
â€¢ Curta Cup CTF solutions: 1st placed team [video] & 2nd placed team
Curta Cup CTF solutions: 1st placed team [video] & 2nd placed team
â€¢ Dan Finlay: redeemDelegation , proposal for more conversational wallet connections
Dan Finlay: redeemDelegation , proposal for more conversational wallet connections
Security
â€¢ KyberSwap Elastic (concentrated liquidity) $54M exploit on mainnet, L2s & sidechains; exploit
reproduction
KyberSwap Elastic (concentrated liquidity) $54M exploit on mainnet, L2s & sidechains; exploit
â€¢ Guide to recovering funds from compromised keys using HackedWalletRecovery
Guide to recovering funds from compromised keys using HackedWalletRecovery
Ecosystem
â€¢ ETHGlobal: Istanbul hackathon finalists 2024 hackathon calendar : London, Sydney, Brussels,
Singapore, San Francisco & DevCon
â€¢ Istanbul hackathon finalists
Istanbul hackathon finalists
â€¢ 2024 hackathon calendar : London, Sydney, Brussels, Singapore, San Francisco & DevCon
2024 hackathon calendar : London, Sydney, Brussels, Singapore, San Francisco & DevCon
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 12.1 to 413.7 gwei, with 31.7 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 21.8 gwei 7.4k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 12.1 to 413.7 gwei, with 31.7 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
â€¢ 7.4k ETH net burn this week
7.4k ETH net burn this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1,930 - $2,131, currently $2,076
ETHUSD : $1,930 - $2,131, currently $2,076
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Blast (preannounced L2) promoted as native yield , taking deposits (no withdrawal), controlled by
3/5 multisig, pyramid style rewards, ETH deposits being invested via Lido
Blast (preannounced L2) promoted as native yield , taking deposits (no withdrawal), controlled by 3/5
multisig, pyramid style rewards, ETH deposits being invested via Lido
â€¢ Circle bridged USDC standard , L2s can deploy with option to later upgrade to native issuance
Circle bridged USDC standard , L2s can deploy with option to later upgrade to native issuance
â€¢ Nick Johnson: .eth & DNS root explainer
Nick Johnson: .eth & DNS root explainer
â€¢ evm.storage EOA pages : view snapshot of an account at a specific block
evm.storage EOA pages : view snapshot of an account at a specific block
Job Listings
â€¢ Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
â€¢ Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
â€¢ Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
â€¢ Nethermind: Lead Software Engineer , BizDev & CTO
Nethermind: Lead Software Engineer , BizDev & CTO
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup
at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Binance: $4.3B settlement with DoJ, FinCEN, OFAC & CFTC; CZ resigns as CEO
Binance: $4.3B settlement with DoJ, FinCEN, OFAC & CFTC; CZ resigns as CEO
â€¢ SEC allege Kraken operates as an unregistered securities exchange
SEC allege Kraken operates as an unregistered securities exchange
â€¢ Tether froze 225M in stolen USDT linked to international crime syndicate
Tether froze 225M in stolen USDT linked to international crime syndicate
â€¢ Wyoming Stable Token Commission request for info/proposals for their stablecoin
Wyoming Stable Token Commission request for info/proposals for their stablecoin
â€¢ Bittrex Global winding down
Bittrex Global winding down
â€¢ Coindesk bought by Bullish (centralized exchange)
Coindesk bought by Bullish (centralized exchange)
General
â€¢ Hacks: HTX & Heco bridge $99M lost and Kronos Research (market maker) $26M lost
Hacks: HTX & Heco bridge $99M lost and Kronos Research (market maker) $26M lost
â€¢ Binius : implementation in Rust of SNARK for towers of binary fields
Binius : implementation in Rust of SNARK for towers of binary fields
â€¢ BabySpartan : Lasso-based SNARK for non-uniform Plonkish arithmetization
BabySpartan : Lasso-based SNARK for non-uniform Plonkish arithmetization
â€¢ Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) explainer
Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) explainer
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
